title: Ep. 13: 'The Watch'
description:
On today's episode Andy & Chris discuss the new Showtime drama 'Billions', wonder if there's too much TV that's just good enough(21:00), try to make sense of Oscars season (38:00) and plot career paths for Alicia Vikander, Tom Hardy, and Leo DiCaprio (46:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
